short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Study smarter with Quizard! Instant AI answers and explanations for your all your questions to help you learn and succeed!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨ Homework & AI Answers Solver
Are you struggling to understand your homework and study materials? Don’t worry, Quizard is here to help!
Take screenshots 📸 and get instant answers, explanations, and related resources for any question. 💁‍♀️

🔑 Quizard AI Key Features:

🪄 【 Instant and Accurate Solutions 】
✅ Instant answers: in just seconds receive answers, explanations, and related resources to your question
✅ The #1 AI in accuracy: we are 20% more accurate than ChatGPT and deliver the highest quality, most accurate answers with speed
✅ 24/7 support: use Quizard anytime, anywhere, we’re always there to help you
✅ Math: Quizard can accurately recognize and solve even the most complex math problems that have symbols which can’t be copy and pasted

🔥 【 Take A Screenshot, Get An Answer 】
✅ Screenshot feature: allows effortless question-asking by capturing a screenshot
✅ Highlight text: simply highlight and solve any question found online
✅ Type In Your Question: you can directly type your question into the text box to receive an instant answer
✅ Universal compatibility: use it on websites like Canvas, Blackboard, Moodle, Google Classroom, and more

🎓 【 Any Subject, Any Level 】
✅ Any type of question: we can solve multiple choice, short and long answer questions, and provide step by step solutions to your word problems
✅ Help on any subject: from math, history, chemistry, biology you name it we got you covered
✅ Every grade level: whether you’re a college student, high school student, or even an adult looking to brush up on your knowledge, Quizard is the perfect tool to help you succeed.

🗣 【 Clarify Your Understanding 】
✅ Ask follow-up questions: interact with Quizard to explore complex topics effortlessly
✅ Related resources: we generate you related resources from the web based on the question to confirm the solution we’ve provided and see how others have solved it

💻【 How To Use 】
🟪 Click the “Add to Chrome” button and pin it to the toolbar.
🟪 Log in to your account.
🟪 Press Cmd/Ctrl+Shift+K to wake up Quizard
🟪 Start working with AI!

🗣️【FAQ】
📌 Is it free to use?
-Yes, we offer limited use for free. For unlimited access, you can choose the Quizard Pro Subscription.
📌 Is my Quizard Pro Subscription active on both the mobile and Quizard Chrome Extension version?
-Yes! If you are a Quizard Pro subscriber link your device in-app or through the Chrome Extension
📌 How can I link my Quizard profile to the extension or from the extension to the app?
-From the extension, go to your settings and click “Link Device.” You will then receive further instructions for linking with your mobile device!
📌 ChatGPT is banned in my country. Does it work in my country?
-Yes. Our chrome extension works in all countries.
📌 Can I use your service on my phone?
-Yes. Quizard is available on all devices (Chrome Extension, iOS, Android). Search up “Quizard AI” in the App Store/Google Play Store

Contact Us
Email: support@quizard.ai
